#define timersub (   a,
  b,
  result 
)
Value:
do {                                                                        \
    (result)->tv_sec = (a)->tv_sec - (b)->tv_sec;                             \
    (result)->tv_usec = (a)->tv_usec - (b)->tv_usec;                          \
    if ((result)->tv_usec < 0) {                                              \
        --(result)->tv_sec;                                                     \
       (result)->tv_usec += 1000000;                                           \
    }                                                                         \
} while (0)
